comments.author: dtownsend@mozilla.com
comments.text: Found while working on bug 406026, for some reason unless we used a more plain value for the url pref some xpcshell tests were leaking. the url formatter is definitely the cause but can't see why.
comments.creator: dtownsend@mozilla.com
